title: What Riot NEEDS to work on.
body:
Here we can discuss the thing that riot can work on to make the community and the gameplay 10x better. watch this video and it may just help you grasp on to what i mean.

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iqem7TI0XR4

replies.body:
mate you have seen nothing.
wait until you see patch 8.12

bruisers will be able to get in, kill the carry, and get out without risk of dying!!
